gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 115, Hornets 92
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Hornets, 115-92. Darius Garland recorded 15 points, four rebounds and 10 assists for the Cavaliers, while Jarrett Allen (17 points, 13 rebounds, four assists) and Georges Niang (17 points, five 3PM) added a combined 34 points in the victory. Brandon Miller led all scorers with 24 points, along with eight rebounds and three assists for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Cavaliers snap a three-game losing streak as they improve to 44-28 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 17-54.
